Name: Brood Lord
PhasesDescription: The Brood Lord starts in Phase I, and goes into Phase II until the end of the next round when all it's minions are defeated.

Actions.Name: Brood Assault
Actions.Description: The Brood Lord makes three melee attacks, and can make them from its space or any brood's space.
Actions.Effect: Gain pierce if three or more brood are adjacent to the target.

Actions.Name: Great Puppeteer
Actions.Description: All allies in a close blast 1 area of the Brood Lord may dash 3 spaces, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Evolve Brood
Actions.Description: Destroy one brood summon and replace it with Great Brood.

Summon.Name: Great Brood
Summon.Effect: 1/round during the Brood Lord's turn, it can move 3 spaces and attack an adjacent character (true strike, melee attack, on hit: [D]+[fray] and shove 1, miss: [fray]).

Actions.Name: Aether Boil
Actions.Description: Summon a blast 1 terrain effect, which cannot overlap with another Aether boil. When the Brood Lord changes phases, all aether boils explode and are destroyed. Characters within must save or take 2[D]+[fray] damage, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Scuttle
Actions.Description: Shove an adjacent character 1, then dash 2.

Actions.Name: Screaming Spire
Actions.Description: The Brood Lord summons a height 1 object in any free space not adjacent to a player character. The spire is destructible (10 hp) and has aura 1. Brood in the aura are immune to all damage and Brood Assault against characters in the area deals maximum damage.
